title: Small factory jobs in jeopardy as Trump tariffs bite
text:
Small factory jobs in jeopardy as Trump tariffs bite 9:12am EDT - 01:35
Reuters spoke to a dozen small factory operators who said the Trump tariffs are offsetting his $1.5 trillion tax cut, leaving them with with no choice other than putting the brakes on hiring. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Reuters spoke to a dozen small factory operators who said the Trump tariffs are offsetting his $1.5 trillion tax cut, leaving them with with no choice other than putting the brakes on hiring.
